name: Lightning Sea Monster Thief for Percy Jackson
name_original: Lightning Sea Monster Thief for Percy Jackson
description:
For the biggest fans of Percy Jackson!
Trivia sourced from the Percy Jackson book and movies.

Loads of entertaining questions are waiting! Questions are randomly selected so no two games are alike.

√ Simple, instant fun!
No in-app purchases required. Super easy to get started.

√ Addictive, big fun!
Learning inside information and fun facts about your favourite characters.

√ Continuous updates, everlasting fun!
We are currently sourcing more trivia all the time! Make sure to update your app for FREE trivia.
